duties_responsibilities.duty: Define operational excellence and the overall engineering direction for the entire company.
Lead a global team of over 1,700 engineers across the US, Canada, Europe, and Asia.
Drive the integration of people and technology to create a more efficient global software organization.
Spearhead the transformation from a waterfall-centric organization to an advanced software development company with agile processes.
Lead new software initiatives to commercial viability and improve software productivity and delivery velocity.
Balance the need for innovation with the development of requirements and process for building amazing products and features.
Deliver the full capability of the Viasat-3 global satellite constellation to bring high-quality, low-cost connectivity globally.
Look ahead of business unit leaders to offer suggestions for new technology innovation and market share growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related technical field (Master's or Ph.D. preferred)
